get.description: Prometheus-style metrics endpoint summarising jobs and snapshots.

post.description:
Accept a public issue report submission.

This endpoint intentionally collects minimal data and does not accept
attachments. Reports are meant for metadata errors, broken snapshots,
missing coverage, or takedown requests.

get.description: Return aggregated usage metrics (daily counts).
Describe the public export endpoints and limits.
Stream snapshot metadata exports in JSONL or CSV format.

head.description:
Return headers for snapshot exports without streaming a body.

Some clients use HEAD requests (`curl -I`) to inspect download headers.

get.description: Stream change event exports in JSONL or CSV format.

head.description:
Return headers for change exports without streaming a body.

Some clients use HEAD requests (`curl -I`) to inspect download headers.

get.description: Return a feed of precomputed change events.
Return a precomputed diff between two snapshots.
Return a live diff between an archived snapshot and the current URL.
Return the most recent snapshot for the same normalized_url_group as snapshot_id.

parameters.name: requireHtml

schema.description: When true (default), only return the most recent HTML snapshot for this page group.
schema.title: Requirehtml

parameters.description: When true (default), only return the most recent HTML snapshot for this page group.

get.description: Return a timeline of captures for the same normalized URL group.
Return an RSS feed for the latest change events.
Health endpoint with basic database and summary checks.

head.description:
HEAD variant of the health endpoint.

Some external uptime monitors issue HEAD requests by default; this route
mirrors the GET health check status code without returning a body.

get.description:
Public archive stats used by the frontend (homepage snapshot metrics).

Keep this lightweight and cacheable; it should not leak admin-only details.
Return per-source summary statistics derived from Snapshot data.

schema.title: Response List Sources Api Sources Get

get.description:
Return replayable "editions" (ArchiveJobs) for a source.

Each indexed ArchiveJob becomes a discrete edition in the replay service
(`job-<id>` collection). The frontend uses this to power edition switching.

schema.title: Response List Source Editions Api Sources  Source Code  Editions Get

get.description:
Return a cached preview image for a source's replay homepage.

These previews are generated out-of-band (e.g. via an operator script) and
stored on disk under HEALTHARCHIVE_REPLAY_PREVIEW_DIR.

head.description:
Return a cached preview image for a source's replay homepage.

These previews are generated out-of-band (e.g. via an operator script) and
stored on disk under HEALTHARCHIVE_REPLAY_PREVIEW_DIR.

get.description:
Resolve a replay URL within a specific job (pywb collection).

Used by the frontend edition-switching UI to determine whether the current
original URL exists in another job, and if so, which capture timestamp to
replay.
Search snapshots by keyword and/or source with simple pagination.

parameters.name: includeDuplicates

schema.description: When view=snapshots, include same-day duplicate captures with identical content.
schema.title: Includeduplicates

parameters.description: When view=snapshots, include same-day duplicate captures with identical content.

parameters.name: from

schema.description: Filter captures from this UTC date (YYYY-MM-DD), inclusive.
schema.title: From

parameters.description: Filter captures from this UTC date (YYYY-MM-DD), inclusive.

parameters.name: to

schema.description: Filter captures up to this UTC date (YYYY-MM-DD), inclusive.
schema.title: To

parameters.description: Filter captures up to this UTC date (YYYY-MM-DD), inclusive.

parameters.name: ranking

schema.description: Ranking version override (v1|v2). Default is controlled by HA_SEARCH_RANKING_VERSION.
schema.title: Ranking

parameters.description: Ranking version override (v1|v2). Default is controlled by HA_SEARCH_RANKING_VERSION.

get.description: Return metadata for a single snapshot.
Serve raw HTML content for a snapshot by reading the underlying WARC record.
List archive jobs with optional filtering by source code and status.
Return counts of jobs grouped by status.
Return detailed information about a single job.
List snapshots associated with a given job.

schema.title: Response List Job Snapshots Api Admin Jobs  Job Id  Snapshots Get

get.description: List issue reports submitted via the public intake form.
Fetch a single issue report by ID.

Admin-only debug endpoint for search relevance.

Returns the same ordering as /api/search but with a score breakdown.
